31 #include <dspatch/SignalBus.h>

33 #include <string>
34 
35 namespace DSPatch
36 {
37 
38 namespace internal
39 {
40 class Component;
41 } // namespace internal
42 
44 
72 class DLLEXPORT Component
73 {
74 public:
75  NONCOPYABLE( Component );
76  DEFINE_PTRS( Component );
77 
78  enum class ProcessOrder
79  {
80  InOrder,
81  OutOfOrder
82  };
83 
84  enum class TickMode
85  {
86  Series,
87  Parallel
88  };
89 
90  Component( ProcessOrder processOrder = ProcessOrder::InOrder );
91  virtual ~Component();
92 
93  bool ConnectInput( Component::SPtr const& fromComponent, int fromOutput, int toInput );
94 
95  void DisconnectInput( int inputNo );
96  void DisconnectInput( Component::SCPtr const& fromComponent );
97  void DisconnectAllInputs();
98 
99  int GetInputCount() const;
100  int GetOutputCount() const;
101 
102  std::string GetInputName( int inputNo ) const;
103  std::string GetOutputName( int outputNo ) const;
104 
105  void SetBufferCount( int bufferCount );
106  int GetBufferCount() const;
107 
108  bool Tick( TickMode mode = TickMode::Parallel, int bufferNo = 0 );
109  void Reset( int bufferNo = 0 );
110 
111 protected:
112  virtual void Process_( SignalBus const&, SignalBus& ) = 0;
113 
114  void SetInputCount_( int inputCount, std::vector<std::string> const& inputNames = {} );
115  void SetOutputCount_( int outputCount, std::vector<std::string> const& outputNames = {} );
116 
117 private:
118  std::unique_ptr<internal::Component> p;
119 };
120 
121 } // namespace DSPatch
